# Module: tf.contrib.bayesflow.hmc



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/hmc.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/hmc.py).

Hamiltonian Monte Carlo, a gradient-based MCMC algorithm.

## Functions

[`kernel(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/hmc/kernel): Runs one iteration of Hamiltonian Monte Carlo.

[`sample_chain(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/hmc/sample_chain): Runs multiple iterations of one or more Hamiltonian Monte Carlo chains.
